instructions: Launch Disney+ on your iPhone or iPad. Tap your Profile icon in the bottom right corner of the screen. Select App Settings . Launch Disney+, tap Profile, tap App Settings Source: Android Central If you don't want to wait until you're on Wi-Fi to download, change the Download Over Wi-Fi Only to OFF . Tap on Video Quality . Select the quality of video you prefer. Under each one, it tells you how many hours of content you could download at each rate before your device storage is full. Tap Video Quality, select your preference Source: Android Central

Launch Disney+ on your iPhone or iPad. Find a movie that you want to download. Tap on the Download button (arrow pointing down to a line) next to the Play and Add to Watch List buttons. Launch Disney+, find movie, tap Download Source: Android Central Tap the X in the upper right corner to go back to browsing the Disney+ catalog.

Launch Disney+ on your iPhone or iPad. Find a television series you want to download. Launch Disney+, find series Source: Android Central To download an entire season , just tap on the download icon next to the season number . Tap download Season, confirm Source: Android Central To download individual episodes , tap on the download button next to the episode's title and info button. Tap Download on episodes Source: Android Central Tap the X in the upper right corner to go back to the main catalog.

Launch Disney+ on your iPhone or iPad. Tap the Downloads tab in the bottom menu bar. Launch Disney+, tap Downloads Source: Android Central If there's a movie downloading, you can tap on the Stop button to either Pause or Remove the download (this also applies to episode downloads). You can also swipe left on a movie (or a series, or an episode) in the download list to delete it. If you're downloading episodes from a series , tap on the series you want to manage downloads for. You can tap Edit to batch delete episodes. Tap the checkbox for the episodes you want to delete. You can tap Select All to select everything at once instead of one-by-one. Tap the Trash Can button to delete those selected items. Tap series, tap Edit, select what you want to delete Source: Android Central Once an item is downloaded, the progress circle changes to a phone icon . Tap it to bring up the Remove Download option to delete the download from your device and free up space. Tap the phone icon on completed download, then choose to play or remove Source: Android Central
